/*
 * CC43-Rumble-ARAN07.cpp

 *      Author: Rishi
 */

#include <iostream>
unsigned long power (int a, int b) {
	unsigned long result =1;
	for (int i=0; i<b;i++) {
		result*=a;
	}
	return result;
}

int digit_sum (int number) {
	int sum =0;
	while (number){
		sum += (number %10);
		number/=10;
	}
	return sum;
}

int main () {
	int testcases;
	std::cin>>testcases;
	int number;
	while (testcases--) {
		std::cin>>number;
		std::cout<<number*power(2, digit_sum(number))<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
